version_description:
We have been working hard to take your right for privacy to the next level and provide a more complete solution for every iOS user without compromise.
- Updated File Manager - create folders, move files etc.
- Touch ID support for newer devices
- Extract audio from mp4 files (convert to mp3)
- Improved Downloader
- Multi-format video player is more stable
- Updated security settings
Thank you for continued support and feedback - if you find bugs or have suggestion to improve the app please send us an email using the bug reporting feature in the app. Your 5-star app reviews are very much appreciated.

We have been working hard to take your right for privacy to the next level and provide a more complete solution for every iOS user without compromise.
- Updated File Manager - create folders, move files etc.
- Touch ID support for newer devices
- Extract audio from mp4 files (convert to mp3)
- Improved Downloader
- Multi-format video player is more stable
- Updated security settings
Thank you for continued support and feedback - if you find bugs or have suggestion to improve the app please send us an email using the bug reporting feature in the app. Your 5-star app reviews are very much appreciated.

In the continued effort to bring you the best of both worlds with privacy and functionality we have added some amazing features in this release. We have taken all your feedback and incorporated as many changes as possible (sorry if we missed someone) but hopefully you will be happy to see all the progress we have made.
What's new:
Chromecast support with subtitles (name the subtitle the same as video file myvideo.mp4 myvideo.vtt or .srt)
Playlist support
Dynamically updated AdBlock (download latest copy from homepage at your convience)
Touch ID optional (use passcode only)
Tons of bug fixes
Thank you for your continued support and feedback - if you find bugs or have suggestion to improve the app please send us an email using the bug reporting feature in the app.
Please remember your 5-star app reviews are very much appreciated.

In the continued effort to bring you the best of both worlds with privacy and functionality we have added some amazing features in this release. We have taken all your feedback and incorporated as many changes as possible (sorry if we missed someone) but hopefully you will be happy to see all the progress we have made.
What's new:
Chromecast support with subtitles (name the subtitle the same as video file myvideo.mp4 myvideo.vtt or .srt)
Playlist support
Dynamically updated AdBlock (download latest copy from homepage at your convience)
Touch ID optional (use passcode only)
Tons of bug fixes
Thank you for your continued support and feedback - if you find bugs or have suggestion to improve the app please send us an email using the bug reporting feature in the app.
Please remember your 5-star app reviews are very much appreciated.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

With this update we are adding some requested features and changing some default settings to make the app more secure and feature rich.
- Ability to block HTTP referrer
- Block iCloud backup by default for downloaded files (you can reenable it in App Settings)
- Unzip/GUnzip/Untar
- Text Editor to open variety of text file and edit them
- iOS 9 styled new app icon
- Updated Spoofing User Agent strings to newest version
- Added Disconnect.me to list of search engines available
Thank you for your continued support and feedback to improve the app. Your 5-star ratings and reviews are highly appreciated and keep us motivated, so a sincere thank you for that.
